EmailTemplate.description: Email to provide pax with access details to eLearning refresher module and eBites on Needs, Style, Climate, Tactics, Phases
EmailTemplate.name: eLearning and eBites Access Details
EmailTemplate.subject: ENSI eBites and eLearning Access Details
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
'Get to where you want to be'
I trust that you enjoyed yourself at the recent ENSI program and have acquired valuable skills.
With all skills it is important that we continue to reflect and practice regularly. ENSI programs are not only about giving you the skills required to approach negotiations confidently but to also ensure that your learnings are sustained and become a force of habit.
To assist this, we have given you {!Contact.Job_eLearning_Access_Period__c} access to the
ENSI 2-3 minute reinforcement eBites on Needs, Style, Climate, Tactics, Phases https://www.negotiate.org/ensi-reinforcement-ebites Password ENSI
ENSI 30 minute interactive reinforcement module http://www.negotiate.org/ens-reinforcement-login Your username and password is {!Contact.Email}
*** Please note your password is case sensitive. We recommend you copy and paste the email above and paste into the username and password fields on the login screen ***
You will have unlimited access until {!Contact.Job_eLearning_Expiry_Date__c} and we encourage you to make use of this resource.
The module is not read only and in some instances you are required to interact/participate before you can move onto the next component.
You will need to have Flash enabled for your web browser and your volume turned on before you begin.
Should you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.
Kind regards,
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} {!Contact.Job_CSC_Title__c}
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
